ABOUT

Hello! I'm Fellipe, an enthusiast for challenges and innovation, at 22 years old, making a remarkable transition from the military field to the dynamic technology industry. My shift to technology was driven by a continuous thirst for learning and growth. Committed to constantly expanding my knowledge, I seek to keep up with the latest trends and technologies in programming and system development.
